dmca.title: [EV1-C1313186V] Aflac Cease and Desist Request; Ref 2.3.106 [ID3:_bZeHZb\lRf19:ID3]
dmca.body:
t -----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] Posted At: Wednesday, October 11, 2006 10:02 AM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [EV1-C1313186V] Aflac Cease and Desist Request; Ref 2.3.106 [ID3:_bZeHZb\lRf19:ID3] Subject: [EV1-C1313186V] Aflac Cease and Desist Request; Ref 2.3.106 [ID3:_bZeHZb\lRf19:ID3] ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Aflac Cease and Desist Request; Ref 2.3.106 [ID3:_bZeHZb\lRf19:ID3] Added by system at Wednesday, Oct 11 2006 02:03 pm X-MailFrom: aflacbrandprotection@aflac.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [70.87.6.111] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Wed Oct 11 15:00:51 2006 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Wed, 11 Oct 2006 15:00:32 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Wed, 11 Oct 2006 15:00:33 -0500 Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from aflacbrandprotection@aflac.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1GXkFk-0007IL-B5; Wed, 11 Oct 2006 15:00:32 -0500 Received: from [38.100.41.83] (helo=cyveillance.com) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from aflacbrandprotection@aflac.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1GXkFj-000LUe-OW; Wed, 11 Oct 2006 15:00:31 -0500 Received: from plcicap1.prod.cyveillance.com (plcicap1.prod.cyveillance.com [10.20.1.21]) by plmail3.prod.cyveillance.com (Postfix) with ESMTP id 3AC9CB7634; Wed, 11 Oct 2006 16:00:20 -0400 (EDT) Message-ID: <18259571.241160596830311.JavaMail.cicusr@plcicap1.prod.cyveillance.com> Date: Wed, 11 Oct 2006 16:00:30 -0400 (EDT) From: aflacbrandprotection@aflac.com To: gibson@skysquad.net Subject: Aflac Cease and Desist Request; Ref 2.3.106 [ID3:_bZeHZb\lRf19:ID3] Cc: abuse@theplanet.com, admins@theplanet.com MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/html; charset=us-ascii Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit Disposition-Notification-To: aflacbrandprotection@aflac.com Received-SPF: none (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: 38.100.41.83 is neither permitted nor denied by domain of aflac.com) client-ip=38.100.41.83; envelope-from=aflacbrandprotection@aflac.com; helo=cyveillance.com; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 11 Oct 2006 20:00:32.0712 (UTC) FILETIME=[E8A81480:01C6ED6F] MIME element (text/html)

10/11/2006

 

Dear Brzezinski Bartosz:

 

American Family Life Assurance Company of Columbus (Aflac) is the registered owner of the trademark Aflac. We recently became aware of your use of our trademarked word Aflac in meta tags (and/or hidden text) at http://30.bastd.info/ to attract internet traffic to your website. Your use of this trademark to attract internet traffic is an obvious attempt to capitalize upon the goodwill associated with the Aflac name. 

 

Accordingly, we demand that you immediately cease and desist from any further use of the Aflac mark in meta tags (and/or hidden text) on your website. Additionally, Aflac must receive a reply to this email within five (5) days from the date of this letter as written confirmation that you will make no use of the Aflac marks in the future. We will be monitoring your website and we await your written confirmation via email to aflacbrandprotection@aflac.com.

 

Nothing in this email shall be deemed a waiver of any rights or remedies of Aflac, all of which are expressly reserved.

 

Should you have any questions about this matter, please do not hesitate to contact aflacbrandprotection@aflac. com.

 

Sincerely,

Brand Protection Coordinator

Aflac Worldwide Headquarters
1932 Wynnton Road

Columbus, Georgia 31999

 

Fax: 706.320.2288

 

Ref: 2.3.106
